title: Himi 204
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko e me’a matalelei,
Pea fakafiefia,
‘Oka fakataha lelei,
‘A e kainga ‘o Sīsū.
2.
’Oku nau mahalo taha,
Pea lea loto taha;
Ko e famili totonu,
‘O e tui mo e ‘ofa.
3.
Pea fakataha lelei,
Ke nau kumi fakataha,
Ki he ngaahi me’a lelei,
‘I he maama ‘o ‘olunga.
4.
Mo nau fakaongo atu,
‘A e ongoongo lelei,
‘A hotau Fakamo’ui
Ki he kakai kotoa pē.
5.
Ko e ‘Eiki ‘o e ‘ofa
‘Oku fekau lahi ia,
Ke tau fai ‘o loto taha
‘Etau fakataha ‘ofa.
6.
’Oku ne tapuaki mai
‘A ‘etau fakataha ni,
Pea fakafonu ‘aki,
‘A e ‘ofa hotau loto.
7.
Ko ia ‘oku tau lelei
Pea fiemālie ai,
Pea fe’ofo’ofani,
‘I he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Eiki. *
